name: Mariana Trench
description: A deep-sea trench not much alike the one on Earth.

name: Sunlit Zone
description: A sandy area with abundant plant life and sunlight.

name: Seaweed Valley
description: A lush valley filled with towering seaweed forests.

name: Echoing Grotto
description: A cavern where sounds carry further than expected, making navigation tricky.

name: Crystal Gardens
description: Fields of bioluminescent crystals, softly lighting the seabed.

name: Silent Observatory
description: Ruins of an ancient outpost, its secrets lost to time

name: Forgotten Engine
description: Remnants of old machinery, humming faintly with residual power.

name: Abyssal Mirror
description: A calm pool reflecting the submersible’s lights perfectly.

name: Luminous Rift
description: A narrow crack in the seabed, glowing with faint blue light.

name: Siren’s Labyrinth
description: A maze of coral where currents create odd, melodic sounds.

name: Pulse Chamber
description: A dome where the water vibrates with a steady, rhythmic beat.

name: Phantom Dock
description: A half-sunken platform, covered in barnacles and seaweed.

name: Spiral Forest
description: Twisting kelp and swirling currents make this area hard to map.

name: Lantern Fields
description: Meadows of glowing plankton, lighting up as you pass.

name: Gravity Well
description: A swirling vortex where objects drift unpredictably.

name: Oracle’s Perch
description: A rocky spire with excellent sonar reception.

name: Shattered Dome
description: Fragments of a collapsed dome, now home to small sea creatures.

name: Whispering Shelf
description: A ledge where the water carries distant, muffled sounds.

name: Twilight Crossing
description: A borderland where light fades quickly, confusing the senses.

name: Leviathan’s Gate
description: Massive stone arches, rumoured to be a migration route for large sea life.

name: Homebase
description: Our research station, badly damaged after the attack from a mysterious creature
